ModMetaData.name: Lord of the Rims - Elves (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Jecrell
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Jecrells mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1400234784
[img]https://i.imgur.com/wtwHAQu.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/LordoftheRimsElves
- This is an unofficial port - This will be removed when/if Jecrell comes back
--- Original Description --- Adds Elves to RimWorld. Includes: Playable Elven race Starter Elven scenario Three Elven factions Mountable (with Giddy-Up!) horses and Lothlorien deer A new giant tree biome: Mallorn Forest Lembas and Elven bread, which is compatible with Vegetable Garden Also includes Elven armor, weapons, walls, doors, and furniture Requires: JecsTools, DoorsExpanded, and Humanoid Alien Races
Mod Showcase from BarKy https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eL5km_cX4Ck
(Apologies that this workshop page isn't very nice. It's 3AM, so I'll fix this up to look nicer tomorrow! =D)
